name: CWO_Playtests
description:
The game have already no tutorial so it's currently hard to undertstand it.

Right click to open/close Menu,

If you put a Tree on a face you need to let it under rain to grow it then under sun.

If you put a meteor you need to let it under wind then under rain then under sun.

The stockpile's build cost is 3 trees & 3 rocks on the same face then it allow you to stock resources and used it on another face. (upgrade cost are 10 trees + 10 rocks then 20 trees + 20 rocks)

The mills allow you to make humans (speed depending of the lv of the mill)

Watermill cost ==>  Build: 10 trees / Up: 15 tress + 5 rocks / up: 10 trees + 20 rocks / up 40 rocks

WindMill cost ==> Build: 15 trees / Up: 10 trees + 5 rocks / Up: 5 trees + 15 rocks/ Up: 20 rocks

GoodLuck, the story and tuto will come soon !

Here the google form for your feedbacks

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfjsgeU-6Y6QfKKAp4bHmWB1uszL9WqlOfz6Sky...
